data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains all the 347 mtDNA Control Region sequences used in the above studied. The file is in fasta format with all the aligned sequences with 497bp.Localities codes: AZ-Azores, MAR-Mid-Atlantic Ridge, SAZ-South of Azores, UK-United Kingdom, IRE-Ireland, MAU-Mauritania, MED-Western Mediterranean, PT-Portugal mainland, MAD-Madeira, AUS-Australia, SAF-South Africa.
